title: New OpenIndiana Release!
content: We're excited to announce the latest release of OpenIndiana, featuring improved ZFS performance and updated drivers. Download now!
author: OpenIndiana Team

title: Community IRC Meeting
content: Join us on IRC this Saturday at 2PM EST to discuss the future of OpenIndiana. All are welcome!
author: Community Team

title: Documentation Updates
content: Our documentation has been updated with new guides for ZFS and DTrace. Check out the docs!
author: Docs Team
